extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected VMware Aria Operations Networks Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the VMware Aria Operations Networks version is 6.x to determine if it is affected by the vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the VMware Aria Operations Networks version 6.x?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Fixed Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected VMware Aria Operations Networks to the fixed version as per KB92684 to mitigate the vulnerabilities.
